Name: Summoner's Mess
About the game: Enter a huge manor to fix the mess you've made summoning a beast from the depths. Look for the three sacred grimoires, hidden in a labyrinth made of rooms, closed doors and unsolved misteries. Will you find it before it gets too dark and you'll get consumed by the fears that we can't see? Enjoy a short time trial experience, memorize the scenario and reach one of the three endings before your torch gets out completely! More than 125 handmade rooms Inventory management Three possible endings Accessibility settings Speedrun mode
Meta Title: Summoner's Mess: Oct 29, 2021, Elendow and Full Overview
